reviewText: Very happy! Item was at my door two days later I was pretty surprised! Movie came sealed as if I purchased from a local store. No damage fast shipping happy customer!
My son is addicted to Sonic---so he was thrilled with this video (he's 5 years old). Has a different tone from some of the other Sonic shows but very entertaining and lots of music.
This video has not left my 3 year old son's dvd player since he opened it on Christmas. I'm sure he has memorized it.
My son loves this movie he plays it over and over every day I have to hide it some times so he can switch it up lol
My 6 yr old loves this movie~  He has watched it a million times!  I'm not a big Sonic fan but I can watch this movie without being bored!  It's cute and even has some good lessons in it.  Good Pick.

My kiddos love this movie! It keeps my boys entertained! Its a great video for the money!
I do reccommend it!
My three year old son loves sonic the hedgehog. Had to buy this DVD because you cant get it on any streaming services out there.

The Sonic Underground DVD arrived quickly and was packaged in a safely manner. I gave this product as a present to my little nephew and he loved it so much. He played it non stop when he first receives it.
